author: coder-amey
body:
The following new attributes have been added:
From CTPPS (6):
std::vector<std::string> lhcState
std::vector<std::string> lhcComment
std::vector<std::string> ctppsStatus
std::vector<unsigned int> lumiSection
std::vector<float> xingAngle
std::vector<cond::Time_t> dipTime

From ECAL (4):
std::vector<float> beam1VC
std::vector<float> beam2VC
std::vector<float> beam1RF
std::vector<float> beam2RF
title: Added the CTPPS & ECAL attributes to CondFormats/LHCInfo
